result.execSummary:
The defendant Shawn D Karol was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Use of a Dangerous Weapon], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Statements made as to Sentencing by both counsel and the Defendant. 

THE COURT ORDERED THE Defendant to serve 10 DAYS in the House of Correction (HOC), consecutive to any other sentence with credit for 7 days TIME SERVED.

THE COURT ORDERED all costs and surcharges WAIVED. Defendant indigent.

Received and filed with the court:
*  Pretrial Incarcerton Credit Form

Defendant Shawn D Karol in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Defendant waived rights and pled GUILTY.  Guilty Plea Questionnaire received and filed.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Parties stipulate to the facts of the complaint as a basis for a guilty plea.  Court found the Defendant guilty as charged in the complaint.  Judgment of Conviction entered.  Parties are prepared to proceed with Sentencing.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Shawn D Karol in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  Michael Damon Phillips appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Plea/Sentencing Hearing scheduled for May 11, 2017 at 08:30 am. COURT WILL RETAIN FILE.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
Signature Bond previously signed to remain.   All previous conditions to continued. Defendant ordered to return back to Justice Point to continue with the program.

Defendant Shawn D Karol in court.  Kevin Shomin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court ordered bench warrant withdrawn.  Recall issued.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 3, 2017 at 08:30 am.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Christian Thomas appearing for Francisco Araiza in court.  Michael Damon Phillips appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.  NO BAIL FORFEITED.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Shawn D Karol in court with attorney Francisco Araiza.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The Court ordered the Defendant to be placed on Level 4 supervision (phone contacts) with JusticePoint.  Jury Trial scheduled for April 17, 2017 at 09:00 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Defendant advised No Contact Order remains in full force and effect.  Defendant to have no contact with Tonya C; KS (dob: 3/19/02); KP (dob: 7/20/99); SS (dob: 11/13/04); QS (dob: 3/26/09).

Defendant Shawn D Karol in court with attorney Brian Christopher Hagner.  Defendant Shawn D Karol in custody.  Hanna Ritchie Kolberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Kies, Branch 45.  Scheduling conference scheduled for January 4, 2017 at 08:30 am.

Case calendared for bail-bond hearing to address violation. Court is in jury trial for today's proceedings.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until September 2, 2015 at 1:30 p.m.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.
Justice Point Program violation report; received and filed. Court and state reviewed violation and would like to take action. Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

Defendant Shawn D Karol in court with attorney Gabriela A Leija.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Defense counsel requests jury trial date. Any and all motions are to be filed with the court by the final pretrial date. Case is adjourned for Final Pretrial Conference and Jury Trial, Branch 37. Final pre-trial scheduled for October 15, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for November 30, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Shawn D Karol in court with attorney Gabriela A Leija.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Defense counsel has received discovery and offer. For reasons stated on the record,   Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 37. Court ordered defendant report immediately to Justice Point Program after Court.  Status conference scheduled for August 13, 2015 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed. Court reviewed violation, will be addressed at next scheduled hearing.

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE POINT for Supervision.
Court orders defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY and to be monitored by drug tests and portable breathalyzers.  
Court orders no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  
Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  
Defendant to have no contact with: Tonya C; KS (dob: 3/19/02); KP (dob: 7/20/99); SS (dob: 11/13/04); QS (dob: 3/26/09).
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Shawn D Karol in court with attorney Elizabeth A Carlson.  Defendant Shawn D Karol in custody.  
Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  

DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.
  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 23, 2015 at 08:30 am.
